thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 26 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Cereno Scientific Requests First Convertible Loan From European Fund

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Cereno Scientific Requests First Convertible Loan From European Fund
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - CERENO SCIENTIFIC AB:
* CERENO SCIENTIFIC REQUESTS FIRST CONVERTIBLE LOAN FROM EUROPEAN HIGH GROWTH OPPORTUNITIES SECURITIZATION FUND
* REQUESTED ISSUANCE OF FIRST TRANCHE OF CONVERTIBLE BONDS WITH WARRANTS ATTACHED, AMOUNTING TO SEK 5,000,000, TO EUROPEAN HIGH GROWTH OPPORTUNITIES SECURITIZATION FUND
* CONVERTIBLE BONDS CARRY NO INTEREST AND HAVE A MATURITY OF 12 MONTHS
* CONVERTIBLE INSTRUMENTS ARE ISSUED AT A SUBSCRIPTION PRICE EQUAL TO ONE HUNDRED PERCENT OF THEIR AGGREGATE NOMINAL VALUE. Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
